thread.section_title: WSJ Life, Style & Arts: Weekend News and Reads
thread.title: Saying OK to Sex? There’s an App for That

author: Elizabeth Bernstein
title: Saying OK to Sex? There’s an App for That
text:
You’re on a date, everything’s going great, and you’d like to become intimate. How do you tell your partner?
There are apps for that.
In the wake of the #MeToo movement and a rash of sexual-harassment scandals, software companies are creating digital ways for people to give their consent to have sex. Apps such as uConsent allow potential sexual...
